code: import{BookStatusType}from"../COMMON";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookList=_ref=>{let{books,title,handleBooking}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:title}),books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-preview",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Author: ",book.author]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Year: ",book.date]}),book.status===BookStatusType.FREE?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"book-status",onClick:()=>handleBooking(book.id,BookStatusType.BORROW),children:"Borrow this book"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"book-status",onClick:()=>handleBooking(book.id,BookStatusType.FREE),children:"Free this book"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"book-status-icon",children:book.status})]},book.id))]});};export default BookList;
